Articles.Content: how do i take a screen shot i want to do a deep space misson and have you guys knowing whats going on in it :sos: :thumbup:

> 
> how do i take a screen shot i want to do a deep space misson and have you guys knowing whats going on in it :sos: :thumbup:

The F1 key will take a screenshot and place it in the \Screenshots\ folder under the game folder.

Cheers!

Skunky
Oh cool i never knew KSP had a built-in capture key
Thanks, Now I can stop writing down information on the space adventure.
